Package com.sicomsa.dmt.solicitude

package com.sicomsa.dmt.solicitude
This package contains the classes and interfaces needed to encapsulate the status and information of a digital certificates download request using the SAT massive download web service.

See: Español

In order to download certificates using this service, certain steps are required:

  1. Request the download by specifying the parameters needed to locate the certificates we need do download.
  2. Verify the request to see if it was accepted; or be awere it is not yet ready; and when it is ready, obtain the identifiers of the packages that we should download in order to get the certificates we requested.
  3. Download each of the packages that were provided to us through the verification service and save those packages in our repository.

It is important to consider that the steps cannot necessarily be carried out immediately, since verification can take hours or days. Therefore, it is necessary to be able to save and maintain the status of a request in order to return to it at another time and be able to continue the process where we left off.

Through DefaultSolicitude we can encapsulate the status and information concerning a download request. We can also save its state and rebuild it later to continue the download process where we left off the last time we tried.

Using DefaultSolicitude we can download the certificates we require. This class will execute the corresponding service given the information and status that it saves. Since it implements Solicitude, it encapsulates its information and status; and provies methods to query its state and information; and to listen to it as it advances in its download processes.


Este paquete contiene las clases e interfaces para encapsular los estados e información de una solicitud de descarga de certificacdos mediante el servicio de descarga masiva de terceros de SAT web service.

Para poder realizar la descarga de certificados mediante dicho servicio, se requieren ciertos pasos:

  1. Solicitar la descarga especificando los parmámetros de los certificados (CFDI's) que queremos descargar.
  2. Verificar la solicititud para ver si fue aceptada; o ver si todavía no está lista; y al estar lista, obtener los identificadores de los paquetes que deberemos descargar para obtener los certificados que solicitamos.
  3. Ir descargando cada uno de los paquetes que se nos proporcionó mediante la verificación e irlos guardando en nuestro repositorio.

Es importante considerar que los pasos no necesariamente se pueden realizar de forma inmediata ya que la verificación puede tomar horar o días. Por lo que se requiere poder guardar y mantener el estado de una solicitud para poderla retormar en otra ocasión y poder intentar continuar con dicha solicitud en otro momento.

Mediante DefaultSolicitude podemos realizar la descarga de los certificados que requerimos. Dicha clase retormará el servicio que le corresponda dada la información y estado que guarda. Y como implementa Solicitud, encapsula la información y estado de la misma; e incluye diferentes métodos para consultar la información de la solicitud y también para poderla escuchar conforme avanza en sus procesos de descarga.

Since:
1.0
Version:
2025.02.15
Author:
Beto Lopez

    Description
    com.sicomsa.dmt
    Provides classes and interfaces to consume SAT's massive download web service.
    com.sicomsa.dmt.solicitude.batch
    Package with classes to create and load a Batch that allows downloading multiple download requests using the same connection.
    com.sicomsa.dmt.svc
    This package contains classes that implement SAT's massive download web service.
    com.sicomsa.dmt.util

  • Class
    Description
    DefaultSolicitude
    DownloadRequest (Solicitude) implementation.
    DefaultSolicitude.EmptyRegistry
    Utility class that provides a concrete implementation of MutableRegistry representing an empty download registry.
    DefaultSolicitude.MutableRegistry
    MutableRegistry extends interface DownloadRegistry adding a method that allows changing the download state of a package identifier.
    DefaultSolicitude.VerifiedRegistry
    Concrete implementation of MutableRegistry that represents a download registry that can be updated.
    Delay
    Values for the state of the Delay.
    DownloadContext
    Methods that class DownloadState requires to make requests to SAT and process the responses received.
    DownloadEvent
    Represents and event generated after receiving a response from the web service.
    DownloadEvent.Result
    Result values of a download event from the WS
    DownloadListener
    Defines an object which listens for DownloadEvents.
    DownloadRegistry
    DownloadRegistry contains methods to view the download statuses of the package identifiers to be downloaded to complete the download request.
    DownloadRegistryImpl
    Implementation of DownloadRegistry.
    DownloadState
    Abstract class representing the state of a download request solicitude.
    DownloadState.Accepted
    Concrete implementation of DownloadState that represents the accepted state of a download request.
    DownloadState.Delayed
    Implementation that overrides DownloadState.Accepted to represent the delayed state, which is when the verify request service has been called and the web service has responded that the verification is not yet ready.
    DownloadState.New
    Concrete implementation of DownloadState that represents the initial state of a request that has not been sent to the service.
    DownloadState.Verified
    Concrete implementation of DownloadState that represents the verified state of a download request.
    Solicitude
    Represents a download request to the massive download web service, with its status and information that is collected as the steps are invoked to download the digital certificates.
    SolicitudeData
    Contains the information collected from a request at different stages.
    SolicitudeData.Delayed
    Contains the information collected from a Solicitude whose request has not yet been verified.
    SolicitudeData.Verified
    Contains the information collected from a Solicitude whose request has been verified.
    StateValue
    Values of a Solicitude state.
